org.dejava.component.reflection.MethodMirror

    Package Description
    org.dejava.component.reflection  

    • Uses of MethodMirror in org.dejava.component.reflection

      Methods in org.dejava.component.reflection that return MethodMirror 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MethodMirror ClassMirror.getAnyMethod(String methodName, Class<?>[] paramsClasses)
      Gets any method (despite of its modifiers) in the current class.
      MethodMirror FieldMirror.getGetter()
      Gets the getter for the reflected field.
      MethodMirror ClassMirror.getMethod(String methodName, Class<?>[] paramsClasses)
      Gets a method from the reflected class for the given parameters.
      MethodMirror ClassMirror.getMethod(String methodName, Object[] paramsValues)
      Gets a method from the reflected class for the given parameters.
      MethodMirror FieldMirror.getSetter()
      Gets the setter for the reflected field.
